channel.title: Plz! I Need Help with the Moparscape folder!
channel.description: Um....i downloaded the newer version of moparscape v3.2 and doesnt have the folder... Cuz i remember that b4 i downloaded, there was a folder with like the stuff in it to change stuff. I just need people or a person to help me find/download the folder or something cuz i really wana change stuff to have some fun on me own server....so if there is any one out there that can help me plz help me.

item.title: Plz! I Need Help with the Moparscape folder!
item.dc:creator: @Darthpaul92 Darthpaul92
item.description:
@Darthpaul92 wrote:

yea but i have another question…wats the JDK 6 download and is the link u gave me the resource of finding the moparscape folder in the earleir downloads of moparscape lkie moparscape v3.1…Cuzi redownloaded moparscape(v3.2) and it didnt download the folder…if this helps…plz help me cuz i dont think some people dont understand…i just need to no if the wedsite is the source where i can download the folder that did come with the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Plz! I Need Help with the Moparscape folder!
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Your web client folder should be in C:\Program Files\

Named “MoparScape”

Your data folder should be in C:\WINDOWS\

Named “.mpr_file_store_32”

Read full topic
item.source: Plz! I Need Help with the Moparscape folder!
